website_summaries.verdict: If you want a tree with numerous features and the choice of white or colored lights, this is a solid choice.
pros: Besides this 9' dual colored tree, there are numerous other options for color, size, and light style
LED lights are very bright and energy-efficient, plus stay cool to the touch
Foot peddle lets you switch between 9 different light settings
cons: Takes a lot of work to fluff out the tips/branches to make it look this full
Needles are scratchy, so wear gloves when handling

customer_reviews.title: Took a chance and are so glad!
customer_reviews.text: Wife was afraid to buy a tree without seeing it in person but we both love this tree. So beautiful once fluffed out. Love the light patterns. Had bought a rotating tree stand after last Christmas but it won't work with this tree but it's ok. It's sturdier than the stand that comes with this tree...which doesn't lock in place. But we imagine that once the tree is in it, it should hold just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Butts

customer_reviews.title: Great looking tree, if the lights worked properly...
customer_reviews.text: Had plenty of good reviews. Had a similar tree previous to this one. Purchased this after seeing one in person. Assembly was straightforward, box was well packed and instructions were easy to understand. Painstaking to pull apart all of the branches, but nice that you can customize it. Plugged it in and....disappointment! For whatever reason, the top half of the tree (see picture) is dimmer than the bottom half! Played with all the troubleshooting scenarios, checked connections and fuses and still... Have tried emailing their customer service (overseas, likely) without any response so far. Will get additional stars based on customer service response. We shall see...
customer_reviews.author: Navy Doc

customer_reviews.title: Charlie Browns Tree Looks Better
customer_reviews.text: We are a real tree family and this year we are unable to cut or own tree so I searched and searched read the reviews and found this one......The tree shown is not the tree I received. Charlie Browns Christmas tree looked better. When I took the tree out of the box I was and put it together I was appalled at how Cheap the tree was and Looked. I thought if i gave it a little love and fluffing it would come to life and be as beautiful as the picture....NOPE and the top section of the tree didn't even work. I can buy a better tree from Walmart at half the price.
customer_reviews.author: Dont Buy this Tree

customer_reviews.title: Very poor shipping
customer_reviews.text: The box this tree arrived in was open. There had been a "feeble" attempt to tape the box back together. The box was so damaged my husband had to assist the delivery person in taking it off the truck. Fortunately and miraculously the tree itself was intact and (after testing) all of the lights worked. In conclusion, anything that costs as much as this tree should arrive in pristine condition......including the box.
customer_reviews.author: L & M

customer_reviews.title: Twinkle light setting!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful tree! Realistic looking needles and branches. I was most excited that 1 of the settings is twinkle lights! I always wanted twinkle lights and didn't even realize this one had that setting!
customer_reviews.author: Jessie W

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous Tree
customer_reviews.text: I bought this tree specifically for the LED color changing lights. I actually wanted a flocked tree with similar lights, but couldn't find one. I decided to buy this and do the flocking myself with Sno-Flock I found also on Amazon. It was a bit of an arduous task, but the result was a gorgeous tree that looks like I spent hundreds of dollars more! Easy to put together, and a nice sturdy metal stand. The lights are beautiful, and I love how they can change colors on their own from white to color! Appears to be very durable, and I look forward to many Christmases to come!
customer_reviews.author: Dewey

customer_reviews.title: Awesome all the way around!
customer_reviews.text: Tree really looks great! I have to think those giving this tree a low rating due to it not looking full just haven't had much experience with artificial trees. It takes time to get it exactly how you want it and is not something you can rush through. This is the case for any tree. Took about 15 minutes to put the four sections together (hint: fluff the top section before putting it on) and about two hours to fluff all the branches. Only question is what options are available for the topper? Does anyone aside from National Tree makes compatible ones? Find the star and bow one to be fairly limited.
customer_reviews.author: S. Burton

customer_reviews.title: Huge variance in light brightness of bottom section and top 2/3rds
customer_reviews.text: We barely got the tree in time for Christmas and once we set it up we realized that the bottom 2/3rds of the tree had MUCH brighter lights than the entire rest of the tree. If you look at these photos you will see what I mean. Unfortunately we were out of town from Christmas until past the return window closing and now we are stuck with a very expensive and very disappointing tree. The entire reason that we were willing to pay this price was to have a beautifully lit, led color changing tree.
customer_reviews.author: Monique

customer_reviews.title: It’s a great tree
customer_reviews.text: When we first took it out of the box I was ready to throw it back in. Each branch really had three offsprings so you fluff 3 instead of 1. It literally took HOURS to fluff and I cussed ithe whole time! I couldn’t imagine that this tree would ever look like the picture. I think it does though. Pretty pleased after all.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli S.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful very easy to put together fluffing and shaping took some time but worth it the leaves could of been softer but there is no problem with it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I am a bit of a tree snob and did not like anything in the store. I took a chance and am so happy that I did! This tree is gorgeous. It is big and full. It does take time to fluff it out but it is totally worth it. The different light settings are great for our family since we all have different preferences on color and fade. We love our new tree!
customer_reviews.author: AG

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy a tree from this company
customer_reviews.text: This tree is nothing as advertised It’s not LED. It’s only colored lights. No foot pedal to even be able to change lights We called them about the tree of which we put up Thanksgiving Day they told us they have no spare parts. They would give us $15 back to keep as is ???? Now we have to take it down and send it back We will never order again What they should have done is send us what we paid for 2 day express and then we can send this dumpy tree back to them Poor Business !!
customer_reviews.author: Randy Chafin

customer_reviews.title: Misleading description, not led lights
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware. Description states dual function led lights but the lights are NOT LED. Also very poor quality on the tree itself.
customer_reviews.author: matthew ewing

customer_reviews.title: Great Lights
customer_reviews.text: We enjoyed the various options with the LED lights. This tree would be best used by someone who could set it up once and never have to take it down. We down have the space to store it while assembled, nor would it fit through our door after being assembled. It was relatively easy to set up but I am concerned about the durability. Will it last as long as our old tree or will it start wearing out after just a few years? I have no way of knowing but have some concerns about that. However, the lights are great and shine brightly.
customer_reviews.author: Grandaddy A

customer_reviews.title: Great tree at an inexpensive price.
customer_reviews.text: This tree is as good or better than those other more expensive trees. I worry that an artificial tree won't be full enough: this one is. I worry that the branches won't be realistic enough: this one is. I worry that there won't be enough lights: there are more than enough. This is a perfect tree and less expensive than most. Highly recommend. LED lights too. The only quibble is that it is heavy. 128 lbs. Really heavy. But that is important for a good tree. Store in the shipping box.
customer_reviews.author: W. McVay

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE LOVE LOOOOVE! my Christmas tree! usually there's always something off about an item you purchase from Amazon, either it smells awful, isn't as seen in the picture, broken pieces or the wrong item. This is definitely my monies worth! its also my 8 year old daughter's first tree(we usually used her nana's tree when we lived together)it was her first time helping with decorating it and she LOVES it!! the tree was very easy to set up, they have tags on it to help & also a manual. Thank you for giving me my monies worth !!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Aside from the fact it took me days to fluff this tree because it is so detailed with multiple branches on each limb and the layers..... I love this tree! I have had so many compliments already. I am very pleased with my purchase.... just be sure you have plenty of wine to drink during the fluffing stage LOL
customer_reviews.author: tessa

customer_reviews.title: The most realistic of all fake trees
customer_reviews.text: We looked at a lot of fake trees, and I thought they all looked to fake. I'm happy with this purchase because this tree doesn't look fake in my living room. It does take a lot of "fluffing", but it gets there. The lights are good, I love that I can set it to fade between white and colored lights. It went together pretty easily, though the instructions are pretty generic for their trees and didn't actually match what we bought, so we had to figure out what to do on our own, though it was pretty obvious. As long as this tree lasts many, many years, I will be very glad we bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Chessie

customer_reviews.title: Better than Balsam Hill!
customer_reviews.text: I went through two very expensive trees from well known, high end artificial tree makers and both were broken or defective. I decided to try my luck with an Amazon tree and this has been the best tree yet! It takes a while to fluff but once fluffed properly its full and gorgeous. My kids and I love that it can change light colors and each day we can have a different colored tree to suite our mood. Buy this tree - you won't regret it!
customer_reviews.author: Monica Malmgren

customer_reviews.title: What a great tree. You get more than you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: Don’t look anywhere else. This is a beautiful tree . I have more ornaments on it than I have ever been able to have on real tree. Feels real looks real. Was fretful about not having real tree! Those fears have turned into sigh of relief that we don’t have needles , mess , husband doesn’t throw back out getting tree trimmed and set in base. So very happy I did research . Different light settings are fun .
customer_reviews.author: Soozie

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous tree
customer_reviews.text: My wife is very particular about her Christmas tree, and this tree has been a huge hit. She's very pleased. I was a little disappointed that it doesn't have the light connections in the center trunk, but everything else about this tree is awesome. The quantity and quality of lights and branch tips is great. It takes a while to "fluff" due to the large number of tips, but the tree looks great. Hopefully, the LED light system will last for many years.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Light versatility is a win-win!!!
customer_reviews.text: We have loved our new tree. During the day, my mom, who lives with us, enjoys the white lights, at night, we live the twinkling colored lights. It’s a beautiful tree! I would add this very important info: start shaping your tree from the bottom! The branches are very stiff and life will be much easier and less painful if you’ll work your way to the top. It’s a spectacular tree! Exceeds our expectations of a blind purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Gladgirl

customer_reviews.title: Relatively easy asebly.  Nice variety of lights
customer_reviews.text: The directions on the recommended assembly video did NOT correspond with the tree we received . The assembly video made it look very easy to assemble and the lights on section two and three were shown to be automatically connected. Not so. After much fumbling and wondering how we could possibly re-crate this tree and return it we discovered some dangling wires that connected the lights to all three sections. Not intuitive or easy to see. It is now working OK but attention should be paid to the misleading video.
customer_reviews.author: G. L. P. C.

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken, too costly to return
customer_reviews.text: Tree arrived in box that looks like it has been re-taped after previous return? Packing damaged, didn't look like original. Bottom section lights did not work (previous return reason?), after looking over wiring carefully found pinched wire at one bulb socket. Repaired and works now. Also, one limb fell off. Would return but cost is too high. Will live with it but can't recommend purchasing. Quality control slipped on this one.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent

customer_reviews.title: Bad electrical/Switch wiring shorts out
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly bummed! The tree is beautiful once assembled and fluffed. Unfortunately, as soon as we plugged it in and clicked the switch it’s apparent there is an electrical issue. None of the colors will stay on they short out immediately, while the white will stay on however, the safety risk knowing there is a short somewhere has left the tree completely useless! One bummed tree owner!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Buboltz

customer_reviews.title: Unnatural Look
customer_reviews.text: The tree was sturdy and straight but branches were symmetrical and you can see right through each layer. It's not full at all. It reminded me of my door garland which I had to add an extra one to make look full. I returned it but was very unhappy with the return charge from Amazon even though I bought a second tree. Poor policy for it's customers.
customer_reviews.author: Old woman

customer_reviews.title: Once installed, this tree is great looking
customer_reviews.text: The challenge in this tree is the fluffing and spreading of the branches - it is not that easy and sometimes painstaking. You may need some light gloves, since the branch material make stick. That said, once full fluffed and decorated the tree can be really stunning. Caution: this tree is heavy - careful with young ones around it.
customer_reviews.author: B. Clarke

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, easy to put together Christmas tree.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing tree for the price. It went together easily and was very full. I loved the different light options but really didnt feel like there were enough lights so I used the tree's colored light setting and added my own white lights. This is the most beautiful tree I've owned and already cant wait to put it up again next year.
customer_reviews.author: T. Froemel

customer_reviews.title: This tree is super great! However...
customer_reviews.text: This tree is great for the money! It looks great all dressed up with ornaments and shines beautifully. The shape and sturdiness is perfect and it’s very easy to set up. However, my only negative point would be that I wish it was the “feel real” branches or the more “lifelike” look. But again, great buy for the money.
customer_reviews.author: S. A. L.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Tree But Electrical Issue
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this tree. It worked GREAT until what appears to be an electrical issue/foot switch or transformer issue took it out. Can't use it anymore I've only had it a month! It allows you to switch between all 9 settings but the lights dim, or get all flashy flashy like an electrical surge when I haven't touched the settings. Contacted company hoping for a resolution! Of course just past the return window. Darn.
customer_reviews.author: Diane C. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great artificial tree
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful tree. Looks exactly like it does in the photos. If you read the instructions and take your time to "fluff" the tree it will looks as good as you want. Love how the limbs go closer to the floor than most artificial trees. Very happy with our purchase. All the light setting work great, with many colors and variations to choose from. The 1 thing I wish is that you could use any topper but with this tree you have to get their product as the electrical input at the top is not a standard plug.
customer_reviews.author: Meg Weeks

customer_reviews.title: Great tree
customer_reviews.text: Love the lights and the look of the tree but fluffing is a very time consuming task and even after there is some spots you can still are through. But where this tree shines is after the ornaments are on and the thin spots are covered by them. All the lights and the different settings makes this a great tree.
customer_reviews.author: DG

customer_reviews.title: Everyone said it was easy to assemble- yes assembly was easy but the lights ...
customer_reviews.text: Was really looking forward to this tree. Everyone said it was easy to assemble- yes assembly was easy but the lights would not work. It came with no real instructions. It took me 4 hours to figure out how to connect the wires and I gave up when only half the tree lit. My husband spent another 2 hours working on it to figure out the order of connections - he marked the wires so we would not have this problem next year.
customer_reviews.author: Dump Trump

customer_reviews.title: Wrong tree sent —looks nothing like the pictures
customer_reviews.text: It was somewhat easy to assemble. But when we plugged it in different parts of the tree would flicker and then lights went out. We replaced some bulbs and it seems to work ok and then the lights went out again!! Definitely a short in the circuit. Also what’s even more infuriating is that it’s the wrong tree!!! The one I ordered had 9 different lighting options controlled by a foot pedal. There was no foot pedal!!!!!! I was sent the wrong tree ! My return is already in the works. Do not buy this tree. Who knows what you’ll get. And it is no way as full as the pictures!!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Dzielak

customer_reviews.title: Realistic and beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Love the branches - looks extremely real! Lights are well distributed. Easy to assemble. Switching between colored or white lights is simple - there's even a pastel lighting feature if you a have a Victorian themed decor. Expect taking 1.5 to 2 hours to the shape the compressed branches. More expensive but has good stucture. After getting the tree, stopped into a large home center and nothing on display compared.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Ehlers

customer_reviews.title: Lights stopped working after 3 weeks.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this tree for the company I work for. We loved the look of it and the 9 light settings. However, all lights and all settings stopped working on Dec. 20, about 3 weeks after we erected it in our bank lobby. Therefore, our beautifully decorated tree had no lights for Christmas. We shipped it back for a return on Dec. 26. We tried a new outlet, new fuses, bulbs, nothing worked. All other devices and lights worked fine from same outlet. My team was disappointed. I think I am going to go with an unlit next. This is just too much money to spend for something that may not work year to year.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy Fortune

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your time if you are expecting like picture
customer_reviews.text: What a disappointment. This tree does not look anything like the picture!!! Sending it back ASAP.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna L. Choe

customer_reviews.title: Lighting Problem
customer_reviews.text: I was going to wait a bit before commenting, but I got an email asking for an opinion, so here it is a little early. Beautiful tree, very full, pleased with the overall appearance . But........in the middle, there is a string of lights not working. A band of darkness in the fully lit tree. I've been looking for a pulled wire or something loose, but havent found it yet. I'll write again after the holiday. At this point, I have to keep it to get through the holiday. Stay tuned.
customer_reviews.author: Luke Corbin

customer_reviews.title: Does not look like pictures.
customer_reviews.text: I need to replace my old tree after it was destroyed in a flood so I took a chance and ordered this one, and was very disappointed. It looks much fuller in the pictures, and as I was separating the branches, there were pieces falling off. I don’t have many expensive items in my home, however my Christmas tree is something I take great pride in so I returned it and found one in Home Depot for less than half the price and I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Deanna Tancona

customer_reviews.title: Cheap thin not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy. Extreme thin. Beverly few branch and one light per branch. Most I’ve ever spent on fake tree and worst one yet.
customer_reviews.author: J. T. Ferstl

customer_reviews.title: customer support very poor
customer_reviews.text: Received the tree without the splitter needed to turn all lights on. Called customer support without any luck. They really don't know what customer support even means. Nothing but the run around then told they will get back to us, that was three days ago. If we're lucky we'll have tree lights before Christmas! It's Nov 25th now....we'll see. For the money compared to others, not bad, but don't believe the photo either, it's about half as full as the photo.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Great for the first year
customer_reviews.text: I bought this tree and once assembled and fluffed it looked great....for the first year. The second year the lights on 1/2 of the bottom piece did not work. I put that side towards a wall and made it work. The third hear only one small patch of lights worked in the center section. If you ask me, this tree is not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: OregonNative

customer_reviews.title: Price is too high
customer_reviews.text: It’s a decent tree. I guess I expected more for the money I paid. I like the various light settings. The tree I received had a lot of lights on the bottom branches but very little lights above that. It looks dark. I’m probably going to have to add more lights to get the look that I want. I bought this to replace an old tree that I had for about 20 years that was purchased from Dillard’s. It had a ton of lights on it so comparing the two, this one seems cheaply made. I probably could have purchased one at Walmart with similar quality but for a lot less money.
customer_reviews.author: Katrey

customer_reviews.title: Really beautiful and easy to put up!
customer_reviews.text: This tree is really great overall! Beautiful lights, more than enough options & very full once you fluff it. It does take some work to get it to look full out of the box, but shedding was minimal. I can’t say enough about how this looks in our living room.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah mude

customer_reviews.title: Really pretty. Good value for the money.
customer_reviews.text: My one issue with this tree would be when putting it together it is a challenging to find the lighting connections for each section. I loved all the lighting options. We changed them daily or sometimes two different settings in one day. It’s sturdy, holds heavy ornaments and has a lovely shape.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Really good tree.  Looks as good as the more expensive trees.
customer_reviews.text: Really like this Christmas tree. We set it up as soon as it arrived and it's been up ever since. The lights are perfect. We still need to fluff and of course decorate it. We'll update our review with picture in a couple of weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic LED Christmas tree
customer_reviews.text: I love that we can select from several different types of lights depending on the mood we’re in! Assembly was easy, though it is HEAVY (just more so than I expected) but that also means it feels sturdier. The stand is sturdy. It took awhile to straighten out the branches and unfold them from how they were shipped, but we won’t have to do that next year.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Andrzejewski

customer_reviews.title: 9’ Xmas tree
customer_reviews.text: Some of the lights didn’t work due to a missing bulb retainer. Registered the product for warranty and then called the company. The tree company rep was very helpful and shipped a replacement light section right out. I replaced the missing socket and now the lights work great. We really like the different colors and modes of operation the lights have.
customer_reviews.author: Smith1

customer_reviews.title: Tree looked great after an hour of fluffing
customer_reviews.text: Tree looked great after an hour of fluffing. Unfortunately within a month the lights on the lower half of tree started to act up. I contacted National Tree company and got little to no response. Finally had to return the whole tree via amazon. would not recommend this tree or the manufacturer. Poor quality of lights.
customer_reviews.author: JXT

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Tree but it takes a lot of time to make it that way.
customer_reviews.text: The tree looks great. We love that the lights give you color options. It takes a long time to set up because the tree needs to be "fluffed". The branches are tightly compressed when the tree arrives and it takes hours of work to spead them so they look like the picture. Once this is done the tree is beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: oldJK

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together and quite fluffy
customer_reviews.text: Great find. The kids loved all the options of the lights and how easy it is to switch. The tree fluffed up quite nicely. The only con I gel is that the most bottom beaches are a bit too low. Adequate amount of lights.
customer_reviews.author: Marina G

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL TREE....GORGEOUS LIGHTS!!!!
customer_reviews.text: So easy to put together and take down....Took us (2 x people) less than an hour to assemble and fluff out all the branch tips...Even less time to disassemble and store....Certainly well worth the effort! We set our tree up in the front entrance to our house--under the protection of the roof line, but otherwise exposed to the outside elements....It stood up admirably to the cold and snow of our Colorado winter....And made a wonderful presentation to everyone passing by on the street outside, and a warm Christmas welcome to all those coming inside....Tons of compliments from friends and neighbors....Such a smart investment....We'll add another one next year to put out on our back deck!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: A Nice Upgrade
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together, the lights that change are pretty cool - it has several different modes from flashing to steady, color to white, or just plain color or white. Looks good, too! It gets four stars because it didn't put itself up! ;-)
customer_reviews.author: Gecko-Loc

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: We read the reviews and decided to purchase this tree. We like the variations in colors and patterns.We like the soft needles, rather than hard plastic that we see around alot. The tree is full and has been working well since we received it a couple of weeks ago. We are happy with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: .Be patient when putting it together
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely Beautiful!!! Was nervous at first, but after putting it together and fluffing each section,turned out beautiful! Took a few hours to finish but well worth every penny!Only thing I can say is to use gloves when putting it together. A little bit prickly.Thank you Amazon for an awesome Tree!!!
customer_reviews.author: winona miller

customer_reviews.title: FLUFF and FLUFF again, and you will be happy.
customer_reviews.text: FLUFF! I cannot state that enough. Firstly, its heavy (for me), which is a good thing as it has metal branches that can be bent as you see fit. The tree is utterly smushed when you open the box, so it will take quite some time to fluff it out. Take your time and you will be very satisfied with the results. The LED light fea
customer_reviews.author: Boston Mom

customer_reviews.title: Lights going out
customer_reviews.text: I liked this tree at first. Liked it a lot. Then the lights started going out-- one segment is out completely, another is flickering-- and the instructions to deal with it are vague or non-existent. Even if I were to change every light in the strand, I am not sure that even that would do it because the instruction manual is apparently for every one of their trees and doesn't address that point. This should be a forever tree, not a two season tree.
customer_reviews.author: Russell Lundberg

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced
customer_reviews.text: Very sparse even after spending lots of time fluffing it. Not as pictured
customer_reviews.author: L233

customer_reviews.title: Rough Branches
customer_reviews.text: Did a lot of research before purchasing a new tree. Like the idea of dual lights. Not a single review I read spoke about the 'feel' of this tree. BE WARNED...IT IS ROUGH! My family used gloves to put it together and take it down. I would suggest long sleeves so your forearms don't get scratched like mine. If you are looking for a lush, softer feel - keep searching because this isn't it. Buyers remorse... should have returned it.
customer_reviews.author: LJ Smith

customer_reviews.title: Overall Happy
customer_reviews.text: Some of the reviews mentioned it wasn’t full after fluffing so I was hesitant to buying it. However each branch has three additional branches that need to be pulled out and fluffed. Great value for money. I think the bottom seems to have more lights but it’s just more spaced out then the top. Overall very happy
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Solid Tree. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Great tree!! LED lights are lovely. It has so many light options from white to multi color with fading options that will settle any fights among household opinions. I hope the lights don’t burn out right at 3 years like my previous tree did by this company. However, I do see some upgrades to the connections that I hope increase the longevity of the lights. Highly recommend. It does take about an hour or so to fluff out and it’s well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Smidgey09

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely beautiful for an artificial tree!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful tree! This was our first time purchasing an artificial tree and it couldn’t have worked out any better. The tree is very full and huge!! We love the foot switch for the lights which you can change from multi color and warm white. Fluffing the tree does take a lot of patience but once you see the end result, it’s worth it. Highly recommend this tree. Thanks Amazon for never disappointing !!!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan and Brittany Antrup

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BUY THIS.  BAIT AND SWITCH
customer_reviews.text: This thing has no where near 2,500 tips or 700 lights. looks nothing like the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur E Campbell

customer_reviews.title: See through!
customer_reviews.text: The picture of this tree looks full with no bare spots, no matter how separated the branches are you can see the middle pole, once it is decorated it is not too bad but totally looks fake. The lighting is fine, multiple settings and easily changed, well spaced and just enough of them. I would not buy again and would have returned it if it was not so needed at the moment.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Tree
customer_reviews.text: This Tree was better than we expected. We received many compliments on how beautiful it was. Not plastic like everything we saw out there prior to looking on Amazon. The only downfall was how long it took to fluff out. Hopefully next year it won't take as long.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful tree
customer_reviews.text: We’ve always had real trees at Christmas, but finally decided to buy an artificial one. This tree is very life like and beautiful. We love it!
customer_reviews.author: dee dee

customer_reviews.title: This is a beautiful tree.
customer_reviews.text: So this year we decide to get an artificial tree because I was tired of dealing with the mess of the needles. We decided on this tree mainly because of the price and brand. This is a beautiful tree after the tediousness of separating and fluffing of each individual branch and limbs. I highly recommend taking the time to do this. I like the options of the lighting as far as switching from solid white to colored or a mix of both. The lighting connections could be a little bit more organized but other than that we are very happy with the purchase of this tree.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Randall

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!  Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: It takes a while to fluff out and prep, but everyone is surprised to hear it's an artificial tree. Looks real and it's gorgeous! Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Jessie J

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty tree, full once you take the time to ...
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty tree, full once you take the time to fluff up the branches... Also has several light settings... We Like the fading from multi to clear... The 1st picture is clear & the 2nd is multiple...
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: The Heights of the tree it's great is very pretty all around
customer_reviews.text: I like the colors they are bright pretty soft I love it
customer_reviews.author: cindy

customer_reviews.title: Love this tree
customer_reviews.text: We love this tree! Everyone thought it was real. We took time to work with each branch...about 2 or three hours to fill it all in. Perfect tree
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what i was looking for
customer_reviews.text: This tree is almost as pictured. You have to take the time to "fluff" the branches and make sure to wear gloves and long sleeves because you will get tiny cuts which is why i did not rate it 5 stars. All the lights worked after it was assembled and fluffed. With other fake trees i had to add extra lights but i did not have to with this one. for the price and size i thought it was a very good deal. Hope this helps!
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous!
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous tree. Love the different lighting options, but holy fluffing. Spent an hour spreading the branches, but hope it’s only so time consuming because it’s the first time. Very pleased with the tree though. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Y

customer_reviews.title: If artificial tree is a must
customer_reviews.text: Well, it's artificial, but boy does it light. About 10 settings with a footpedal to make different configurations. Good job, folks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great tree
customer_reviews.text: Great tree. Very large and full. Ton of lights which look amazing and bright. Good quality and easy to assemble. We spent time on each section.
customer_reviews.author: Cp

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful tree!
customer_reviews.text: While a bit expensive, but I used AMEX points, the tree is beautiful. The versatility with the LED lights makes ALL the difference.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Upshaw

customer_reviews.title: Great tree
customer_reviews.text: Bad...One of the branches was busted. It is not as full as it looks in the ad picture. Good... It is nice, the led lights are beautifully done. The limbs ar ed the perfect color. And its all in great proportion.
customer_reviews.author: Big Harm

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful tree, worth the price for sure
customer_reviews.text: This tree is beautiful. Yes, you do have to do a bit of fluffing. But honestly, it doesn’t take all that long. It was delivered at 4:45 and it was totally put up and ready to decorate by 5:45. The lights are bright and many functions make the look customizable. This is a great tree that I’m happy I purchased and I look forward to using it for many years!
customer_reviews.author: CatMom814

customer_reviews.title: Wow! Beautiful tree!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this tree after lengthy review of all the comments. Wow! This is a beautiful tree and only took a few minutes to assemble. It did take about 45 minutes to shape it but it is beautiful. Very satisfied and feel we got a lot for our money!!
customer_reviews.author: Laura from FL

customer_reviews.title: Thinking tree.
customer_reviews.text: This tree’s lights twinkle in such a beautiful manner. The size and ease of installation along with the price made the purchase a no brainier. The box was damaged sadly so we could not use it to store the tree but had to buy new storage.
customer_reviews.author: Pam Bogie

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I saw some of the bad reviews so I was a little hesitant to buy this tree. However, I am pleased to say this came as advertised. It takes a while to get the branches all sorted out there are a lot of them, but take your time (maybe an hour with 2 people) and it looks great. The multi function lights are a big hit with the wife and kids. I would recommend this product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Joyner

customer_reviews.title: Great looking tree
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to assemble and it really looks great! We will use it for many Christmas in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Florence Rink

customer_reviews.title: Not happy!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this tree since 2015, and it has lit perfectly until now. The power cord connecting everything has ceased to function and now I don’t have a working tree! I am frustrated as each “section” lights up but the splitter and controller no longer work! EDIT: The company itself sent a new cable since this review. I have a working tree but it is an outdated model.
customer_reviews.author: Alison G. Norton

customer_reviews.title: New tree 🌲
customer_reviews.text: Looks great hopefully it lasts for 5 years or so
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Takes a lot of time to fluff and separate
customer_reviews.text: After Reading the reviews, I decided to order this tree. I like the fact that I could change the lights from clear to color. I worked on fluffing this tree for over 10 hours total to get it to look like it does. I almost sent it back after opening the box, but decided to put in the work. It is beautiful, but I wouldn’t order it again had I known.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Gordy

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money spent
customer_reviews.text: It was not as full as the picture shown. Tons of holes even after fluffing for a month and the lower section came warped. Some of the limbs touched the floor. I feel like it should have been better for the price spent. This is my second artificial tree purchase after 22 years of marriage. My first tree lasted me 22 years and I think it looks better than this one.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Prickett

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful tree! Good value!
customer_reviews.text: Really love the end result but it took forever to fluff this tree. But it being the first time that’s expected.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Patereau

customer_reviews.title: Easy, beautiful tree!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this tree up for over a week and it is functioning beautifully. The set up was quick but it did take me about an hour to fluff the branches. I really am enjoying the different options for the lights. The colors are very vivid. I highly recommend this tree. I really debated and spent a lot of time researching it before I bought. I am glad I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Julia A. Fach

customer_reviews.title: We love this tree!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased the 10 ft tree and we absolutely love it. Couldn’t be more happy with how it turned out. Slightly confusing at first to connect the lights from each section to the next, but after you get it figured out, the tree looks great. We love the switchboard light pedal also. I believe there are six different settings and each one of them works on our tree. Everyone compliments our Christmas tree when they are over! Definitely a tree I would suggest to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as advertised. No surprises. Multiple light function is a nice addition. Great value for the money
customer_reviews.author: John C. Russell

customer_reviews.title: Great looking tree with high quality and value
customer_reviews.text: This tree was easy to assemble out of the box and I’ve had house guests ask me if the tree was real. The lights and light options give the tree appeal. The plug and control for the lights works fine and I haven’t had any trouble with it but it does seem fragile. Overall the tree comes as advertised and we are very pleased with the quality and value.
customer_reviews.author: Aimee Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Very uneven lights, otherwise nice
customer_reviews.text: Really nice if you take the time to fluff it. However I am very disappointed that the lights are so uneven — as you can see in the photo, there are way more lights on the bottom than on the top. I was hoping once it was decorated it wouldn’t be noticeable, but I did just purchase an extra string of lights after we finished decorating.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren R.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty tree, but painful to put together!
customer_reviews.text: Yes it comes in three easy pieces. However the pain that I endured fluffing our the branches. My hands and arms looked like a cat attacked me. It took hours for me to fluff them up all the while bleeding from the scratches. Finished product looks great but beware.
customer_reviews.author: vicki smith

customer_reviews.title: It takes 2 hours to spread out all the branches.
customer_reviews.text: I really like the sturdiness of the branches and how easily you can put any ornament anywhere. There are plenty of lights and it looks real! I am not sure how we will store it since it could never go back in the original box. I did not want to go with an artificial tree, but it will make our lives more simple.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We would buy this tree again.
customer_reviews.text: The tree is beautiful and we like the various light choices we have. It is full and looks exactly as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: not as shown
customer_reviews.text: tree wasn't as full as I thought and made of real scratchy material,,scratched us all up trying to fluff it out and the connectors were hard to find also hard to get down and apart also wouldn't go back in its own box,,wasn't worth 600$ I won't use it no more !!
customer_reviews.author: Donna Fickey

customer_reviews.title: Pretty tree lights Are defective
customer_reviews.text: Tree is beautiful but lights are defective seem to be out of phase colored at top then white on bottom if white on top colored on bottom can not get through to customer service center
customer_reviews.author: jerry amrhein

customer_reviews.title: Looks awesome. Took a LONG time to fluff out all ...
customer_reviews.text: Looks awesome. Took a LONG time to fluff out all the branches, but well worth it! Love the slow color change option.
customer_reviews.author: PD Haberle

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with the tree. I was worried about buying a tree unseen, but I couldn’t be more pleased with my purchase. It did take me almost two hours to fluff the branches, but it looks beautiful. It’s a great buy at any price.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Cwiklinski

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: All the fluffing is worth it in the end! Beautiful tree.
customer_reviews.author: Cristy

product_meta.title: National Tree Company Pre-lit Artificial Christmas Tree | Includes Pre-strung Multi-Color LED Lights and Stand | Dunhill Fir - 9 ft
product_meta.description: Size:9'The Artificial Dunhill Fir Christmas tree is trimmed with pre-strung LED lights with a foot switch, which controls 10 different light colors and actions. This decorative tree, with its hinged branch construction, goes up fast, leaving more time for holiday cheer. Tree branches are pre-attached at the center pole using a hinge system, with each branch lowered into position in preparation of final shaping. The fir tree decor is designed with a fire-resistant and non-allergenic material, making it a great accent piece wherever it is placed. A diameter of 66 inches at the base, it also includes a metal tree stand along with the assembly instructions. Decorations and ornaments are not included.
feature_bullets: NATURAL LIFELIKE APPEAL: Our pre-lit artificial branches look ultra-realistic and lifelike. With 4,026 individually crafted branch tips, this full bodied tree is as charming as the real thing.
SIMPLE SETUP AND STORAGE: Convenient hinged branches and pre-strung lights allow for easy setup and disassembly.

LASTING DURABILITY: Built to endure many holidays with its sturdy metal base and 900 LED lights. Our light system lets you change from warm white to multi-color with 10 different functions. Our time-tested needles are fire resistant and non-allergenic.
IDEAL SIZING: Tree stands 9 feet tall and 66 inches in diameter at the base. For its most lush and full form, plan on taking 60-90 minutes to shape the tree.

BUY WITH CONFIDENCE: National Tree Company is a USA-based family owned and operated business established 60 years ago. All of our products come with a limited 5 year warranty (3 year on lights). Our friendly USA customer service staff will assist with product and parts' questions.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars763 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
